Text:
Toy Story 2 herein will not play on my Divx compatible Panasonic DMR-EX28 DVD recorder while the other two work perfectly.
BTW: I play using a 16GB USB Flash drive.
The file plays fine on my PC using either MPC-HT and VLC 1.1.7. 
In the DVD rec, the file starts to play but acts like it somehow detects the file as copyrighted!? Any suggestions? Meanwhile, I will try a diff. download.
DrChiron: Use divX converter on it and try then to play it, worked on my philips dvix player, using a 2.0 usb flash player
